ygData.subject: Re: Weapons at higher levels (20+)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal  To:  Sent: Saturday, January 08, 2000 5:58 PM Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 08, 2000 5:58 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons at higher levels (20+)


> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
> On Sat, 8 Jan 2000, Brangwen wrote:
>
> > My husband is an enchanter, and quite a good one. Any of the AE songs
(CoD,
> > DDD, Largo's, Lullaby, etc) will disturb the enchanter's mezzing, making
it
>
> Largo's does not wake up mobs from an enchanter's mez/thrall, damage is
> required (or something overriding it that doesn't stack, e.g. lullaby).
>
> Athren

okay. Good to know. I havn't used that particular one (Largo's) as much -
but i do know that most AE songs tend to have the added "quality" of
attracting multiple mobs that you don't necessarily want to pull to your
group. That's another reason to be careful what you sing... and where you
sing it.

Btw... on a side note... I really appreciate all you people posting to this
list - I learn a lot every day from it and have been adding tactics talked
about here to my arsinal of strategies. Thank you everyone!!

Brangwen Incantare <New Outriders>
L25 (I JUST leveled last nite - YEAH baby!!!)
Lady Wood Elf Bard, The Rathe
=================================
